duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with providing quality construction administration, observation, monitoring, and reporting services for local government clients addressing civil infrastructure needs and improvements.
Effectively interpret and communicate plans and specification requirements.
Work with a project team developing and understanding construction plans and specifications for infrastructure systems (water, sanitary sewer, transportation, civil site, and stormwater).
Serve as a liaison between clients, contractors, and company personnel.
Perform constructability reviews, preparing quantity takeoffs and construction cost estimates, understanding contract documents.
